attributes.title: this is bad❤️
attributes.review: i was beyond excited to take a deep dive🧜‍♀️ into the dumpster fire🔥that is the ✨trump administration✨, and it’s exactly what i expected❤️glitchy👾hard to navigate👷 difficult to understand🤷‍♀️all around a garbage app💩and i had a terrible experience. would not recommend, unless you’re a white supremacist, and if you are, which you probably are, die❤️we’ve grown past the need for you❤️

attributes.title: Delete This App
attributes.review: I got this App with the hopes of learning more about TRUMP! But then a horrible Orange Creature with pasted on hair started haunting me. Clawing at me with its tiny figures, telling racists good job..... I just can’t do it. I had to delete it. The App comes with a horrible creature

attributes.title: Not good at all
attributes.review: Seriously, I got the app because I love trump and I’m a trump supporter. But this app is extremely slow and laggy, it’s not just me, all of my other conservative friends have this issue too. Sorry trump.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app crashed my phone multiple times to the point where i had to delete it off my phone

attributes.title: non functioning app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i couldn’t believe that an app created by the man himself donald trump couldn’t possibly be as bad as all reviews were saying. This app made me switch parties.

attributes.title: Never recommend
attributes.review: Very non intuitive app, took up way too much of my time to figure out how to use. Would not recommend. Horrible content.

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: The app constantly spams you until you interact with it it got so bad to the point we’re I felt I was being violated of my own time. Very bad app would never recommend.

attributes.title: I know it doesn’t sound nice. But not everything is nice.
attributes.review: I have downloaded the app. I mean, it’s an app. It looks like a prime-time app. Number one, why does this app exist? And number two, literally the worst app ever.

attributes.title: Poor
attributes.review: This app was very poor. Lots of bug issues and wasn’t working very smoothly. Also I don’t like the content on it. Very poor app please get this deleted off the App Store. 🧚‍♀️✨disgusting🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: This app is Racist
attributes.review: This app is very tremendous and big and very very racist, I was having problems using the app so I called customer service for help, the lady on the phone then continued to call me a N*gg**, and said blacks can’t use the app.
